text: Mata Hari is a 1985 American erotic biographic drama movie directed by Curtis Harrington and stars Sylvia Kristel, Oliver Tobias, Christopher Cazonove. It was distributed by Cannon Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1985 drama movies Category:1980s erotic movies Category:1980s biographical movies Category:1980s historical movies Category:1980s American drama movies Category:Movies set in the 1900s Category:Movies set in the 1910s Category:Movies directed by Curtis Harrington
title: Mata Hari (1985 movie)
